title: Low-cost Indeed
text: The company does make effort to make the flight process as swift as possible, however it would be nice if there were more employees scattered around the check in station and the gate for questions and further information, since most operations are now automated (like check in and baggage drop). It was said that the gate will close at 7:40 and we only began boarding on 7:50. When we landed, the bus to carry us back to the airport took twenty minutes and when it arrived it did contain all passangers and we waited for an additional bus. Also the flight attendents just run accross the aisle, stepping on my leg on their way.

title: Anyone can enjoy
text: This museam combines fun and engaging activities that children can enjoy, along with interesting pieces of information related to the German history of espionage. Covers anything spy related - from a short history of cipher, to double agents, german spies, and intelligence organizations and fake news. Can be a bit crowded.
place: Skip the Line: German Spy Museum Berlin Ticket

title: Nice place to get a beer
text: Very nice place to enjoy some authentice beer, and reasonably priced. Did not try the food, though..

title: Very pricey but delicious food
text: the place is very expensive. However dishes were great and service was warm. A splurge for a special occasion.

title: Functional and Nothing Else
text: Attractive location, clean rooms and nice view. Breakfast was good but slightly crowded. The bathtub and sink are not seperated from the bedroom (only by a thin curtain that did not cover the section entirely), which was not mentioned in the site - room is very small. However, this hotel gets the job done.
place: Park Inn by Radisson Berlin Alexanderplatz

title: Fresh Ingredients and Delicious Food
text: Service was very warm and friendly, food tasted fresh and homemade - necessary break from all of the tourist-y, overpriced restorount posing as authentic. The food was delicious, especially the green balls and the taramasalata. However it did seem like th place was very busy and waitors struggled to keep up.

title: Delicous
text: Atmosphere is very pleasnet, wine was delicious. The waitor was very friendly. We ordered the salad which was nice and fresh, the zukini balls were refreshing and comforting. The kabeb was excellent as well. Fries were very good as well. Highly recomend!

title: Not very good
text: We thought this is a nice place of small, authentic dishes. The atmosphere is very nice and the service is friendly. However, the food is not good. The "mommy handmade vine leaves" had an industrial taste and we suspect that they came from a can. They were also too salty. The fried cheese was nice, The sausage was okay, the salad was excellent and the fava was refrigerated for some reason and we didn't wat much of it. We are also Mediterranean and we know how this food tastes when it is properly made. Could be nice if you are unfamiliar with the cuisine. They didn't charge us for the vine leaves, which was nice.

title: Breathtaking building, poorly treated
text: Considered by many a must see in Athens, the acropolis is breathtaking, however the setting causes the experience to not be as powerful as it could. The site is often extremely crowded, with a massive line in front of the entrance and the exit. You are not allowed in the building itself and can only view it from the outside, which is disappointing. The building is under construction, which spoils the effect of the place. We do not regret seeing it, it just was not as good as it could be.

title: Classy brunch
text: Very nice setting, the place feels clean and neat. Simple and clean breakfast. We received one meal few minutes before the other, but the wait was not a deal breaker.

title: Just get coffee
text: Coffee of excellent quality, food is mediocre at best. We first ordered a lentil salad, which was rather unappatizing. However they opted the salad for a greek salad, which was ok. The atmosphere is very pleasant.

title: This is delicious
text: Extremely sweet, great setting and quick service. Highly recommended! Nice snack for on the go. You should share a dish with another person, since the dish is so concentrated and rich.
